description.en: Avalanche (AVAX) is a cryptocurrency launched in 2020. Avalanche has a current supply of 461,890,489.52911115 with 430,221,389.52911115 in circulation. The last known price of Avalanche is 14.3868055 USD and is up 1.64 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1030 active market(s) with $463,479,364.61 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://avax.network/.
